reporting-org.narrative: Bundesministerium für wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung (BMZ)
Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ)

title.narrative: Program for Information and Dialog European Union

description.narrative: Das Dialogprogramm leistet einen Beitrag zur Entstehung, Unterstützung und Stärkung von alternativen Entwicklungsmodellen im Rahmen einer gerechten Weltwirtschaftsordnung. Aktivitäten sind neben Veranstaltungen auch Publikationen, wissenschaftliche Studien und Bildungsmaterialien, die in fast allen Ländern der EU durchgeführt werden.

The Conversational Program contributes and supports to the formation and strengthening of alternative development models in the frame of a just international economic order. Activities are beside of educational Measures also publications, scientific studies and educational materials, which will take place in most of the European countries.

The Conversational Program contributes and supports to the formation and strengthening of alternative development models in the frame of a just international economic order. Activities are beside of educational Measures also publications, scientific studies and educational materials, which will take place in most of the European countries.
